objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Drama lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original drama themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Drama story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in drama context
Character B: Responding in slang register within drama theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with conflict
technology in daily life with tension
technology in daily life with struggle

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
